feature.heading: GAME CHANGER.
feature.leftBody: FitSoc reimagines how you discover and join sports in Hong Kong. Browse an interactive map of sessions happening near you, connect with clubs, and show up ready to play. No more group chats, no more guesswork.
feature.rightBody: Every court, every pitch, every trail. FitSoc is designed from the ground up for Hong Kong's unique sports culture — from rooftop basketball to harbor-side running groups. This is your city, your way to play.
